"What the hell is this? I'm taking this bastard down!" — Detective David Tapp
Tenacity.name: Tenacity

This_Is_Not_Happening.description:
You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress.
  • Increases the Success zone of Great Skill Checks while Repairing and Healing by 10 / 20 / 30 % when in the Injured State .
This_Is_Not_Happening.name: This Is Not Happening

Troubleshooter.description:
"No amount of distraction will shake you from your primary task."

When you are chased by the Killer, Troubleshooter activates:

  • The Aura of the Generator with the most progress is revealed to you.
  • The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 4 / 5 / 6 seconds after dropping a Pallet .

These effects linger for 6 / 8 / 10 seconds after ending the Chase, after which Troubleshooter deactivates.

"Nothing gets done around here if I don't do it." — Gabriel Soma
Troubleshooter.name: Troubleshooter

Unbreakable.description:
Past battles have taught you a thing or two about survival.

Once per Trial, you can completely recover from the Dying State .

  • Your Recovery speed is increased by 25 / 30 / 35 % .

"Goddammit, I am seriously FUBAR!" — Bill Overbeck
Unbreakable.name: Unbreakable

Up_the_Ante.description:
All will be well in the end; you just know it.
Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you.

For every Survivor still in the Trial, Up the Ante is granted +1 Token :

  • Increases the Odds of every Survivor succeeding a Self-Unhook attempt by a stack-able 1 / 2 / 3 % per Token, up to a maximum of 3 / 6 / 9 % .
"What can I say? I'm just a very lucky guy... I'm sure some of it will rub off on you." — Ace Visconti
Up_the_Ante.name: Up the Ante

Urban_Evasion.description:
Years of evading the cops taught you a thing or two about stealth.
  • Increases your Crouching Movement speed by 90 / 95 / 100 % .

"The paint is still fresh but I am long gone." — Nea Karlsson
Urban_Evasion.name: Urban Evasion

Vigil.changelogs:
Patch 8.5.0
  • Buff : doubled the Perk's range to affect other Survivors from 8 metres to 16 metres .
  • Buff : further increased the Recovery Rate bonuses from 20 / 25 / 30  % to 43 / 55 / 66  % .
    • It should be noted that this Patch adjusted the in-game description to refer to a time-reduction with adjusted (but equivalent) values of 30 / 35 / 40  % for the Tiers.
      Previously, the in-game description would match the coded values by referring to a Recovery-rate-increase instead.
Vigil.description:
You look over your friends even in dire situations.
  • Increases the Recovery rate from the following Status Effects by 43 / 55 / 66 % :
    • The Blindness , Broken , Exhausted , Exposed , Haemorrhage , Hindered , Mangled , and Oblivious Status Effects .

Vigil extends its effect to all Survivors within 16 metres of your location and lingers for 15 seconds .

"I am gonna be here when you wake up. You are gonna make it." — Quentin Smith

Patch 8.5.0
  • Buff : doubled the Perk's range to affect other Survivors from 8 metres to 16 metres .
  • Buff : further increased the Recovery Rate bonuses from 20 / 25 / 30  % to 43 / 55 / 66  % .
    • It should be noted that this Patch adjusted the in-game description to refer to a time-reduction with adjusted (but equivalent) values of 30 / 35 / 40  % for the Tiers.
      Previously, the in-game description would match the coded values by referring to a Recovery-rate-increase instead.
Vigil.name: Vigil

Visionary.description:
"You are remarkably focused on your means of escape."

You benefit from the following permanent effect:

  • The Auras of Generators are revealed to you within 32 metres .
Visionary is temporarily deactivated for 20 / 18 / 16 seconds whenever a Generator is completed.
Visionary.name: Visionary

Wake_Up!.changelogs:
Patch 8.5.0
  • Change : now increases Opening speeds for each alive survivor.
    • Nerf : reduced the opening speeds from 15 / 20 / 25  % to 8 / 10 / 12.5  %
    • Buff : grants a 8 / 10 / 12.5  % bonus for each alive survivor, up to a maximum of 32 / 40 / 50  %
    • The developers have explained that this change was made to better fit the intention of the perk being used more altruistically rather than selfishly. (see Gallery )
Wake_Up!.description:
Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:

Once all Generators are completed, Wake Up! activates:

  • The Auras of the Exit Gate Switches are revealed to you permanently while within 128 metres .
  • Your Aura is revealed to all other Survivors within 128 metres while you are opening an Exit Gate .
  • Increases your Gate-Opening speed by a stack-able 8 / 10 / 12.5 % for each Survivor still alive in the Trial, including yourself, up to a maximum of 32 / 40 / 50 % .
"Ok, look. If we survive the next 24 hours, then I'll take you out on a real date." — Quentin Smith
Patch 8.5.0
  • Change : now increases Opening speeds for each alive survivor.
    • Nerf : reduced the opening speeds from 15 / 20 / 25  % to 8 / 10 / 12.5  %
    • Buff : grants a 8 / 10 / 12.5  % bonus for each alive survivor, up to a maximum of 32 / 40 / 50  %
    • The developers have explained that this change was made to better fit the intention of the perk being used more altruistically rather than selfishly. (see Gallery )
Wake_Up!.name: Wake Up!

We'll_Make_It.description:
Helping others heightens your morale.

After unhooking another Survivor, We'll Make It activates:

  • Increases your Altruistic Healing speed by +100 % for 30 / 60 / 90 seconds .
"I am confident we can all escape in one piece if we help each other."
We'll_Make_It.name: We'll Make It

We're_Gonna_Live_Forever.description:
Your few friends deserve the best protection.

You benefit from the following effect when healing a dying Survivor:

  • Increases your Healing speed by +100 % .
Any dying Survivor you heal back to the Injured State benefits from the following effect:
  • Grants the Endurance Status Effect for 6 / 8 / 10 seconds .
    • This effect can only be triggered once every 30 seconds .
"Come on then, let's ave' it! I don't give a shit pal." — David King
We're_Gonna_Live_Forever.name: We're Gonna Live Forever

Wicked.description:
"They can try to hurt you.
But you're not going down so easily."

After you are unhooked by any means, Wicked triggers its primary effect:

  • The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 16 / 18 / 20 seconds .
While hooked inside the Basement , Wicked potentially triggers its secondary effect:
  • First Hook Stage : 100 % to succeed an attempted Self-Unhook .
  • Second Hook Stage : does not trigger the effect.
  • Last Survivor Standing : does not trigger the effect.
"I haven't let anyone get in my way before. You think I'm gonna start now?" — Sable
Wicked.name: Wicked

Windows_of_Opportunity.description:
Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

The Auras of Breakable Walls , Pallets , and Windows are revealed to you within 24 / 28 / 32 metres .

"Rise and shine, work hard, carve out your name,
Take aim, pull the trigger, hit the bulls eye for fame,
Know the value of faith, an' family, and don't you complain,
Open wide, your windows of opportunity" — Kate Denson's "Windows of Opportunity"
Windows_of_Opportunity.name: Windows of Opportunity

Wiretap.description:
You know that the best way to stay one step ahead is to keep tabs on the competition.

After repairing Generators for a total of 40 % , Wiretap activates:

  • Press the Active Ability button while near a partially progressed Generator to install a Trap , which stays active for 100 / 110 / 120 seconds .
  • Whenever the Killer comes within 14 metres of the Trapped Generator their Aura is revealed to all Survivors.
Wiretap deactivates after the Generator is damaged or once the timer runs out.

The Auras of Trapped Generators are revealed to all Survivors in yellow .
Wiretap.name: Wiretap
